scripts.start: REACT_APP_CURRENT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD) npm-run-all -p watch-css start-js
scripts.deploy-azure-dev: REACT_APP_APPINSIGHTS_KEY=29a75c50-8485-4d80-8e1b-41b1a091abb6 REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL=https://dev.simplereport.org/api/graphql PUBLIC_URL=/app/ react-scripts build && az storage blob upload-batch -s build/ -d '$web' --account-name simplereportdevapp --destination-path '/app'
